## Output.filename property

The [Filename](./rspeedy.filename.md) determines the name of the JavaScript bundle file to be output. These bundles will be written to the directory specified by output.path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filename?: string | Filename | undefined;
```

## Remarks

If a string is provided, it will be used as [Filename.bundle](./rspeedy.filename.bundle.md)<!-- -->.

## Example

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy';
export default defineConfig({
  output: {
    filename: '[name]/[name].lynx.bundle',
  },
});
```
